name: Tetrasin
description:
This is a high precision platformer, that relies on frame skips. Some jumps featured in this game require pixel perfect position. 

Currently it features 36 single player levels and 14 coop levels. You can play with a keyboard or a xbox360 gamepad.

 It is in an unfinished state, if you encounter a crash you can send me the error message and describe what you did and I'll fix it. When it comes to development chances are that from time to time I will be polishing the game.

This game is best played with a friend, hope you like it.

Controls:

Menu

Navigate with a mouse.

Backspace/B - go back a screen. ( It works in game too )

f - fulscreen

Game

Singleplayer / Gamepad

Arrow keys / Dpad or Left stick - left/right

Space / A - jump

w / Left Bumper - reload checkpoint

q / Right Trigger - wall

e / Left Trigger - slow

Tab / X - score

Multiplayer Player 1 / 2 / 3 / 4

Arrow key left / a / g / numpad3 - left

Arrow key right / d / j / numpad9 - right

Arrow key up / w / y / numpad5 - jump

Right Control / q / t / numpad2 - reload checkpoint

Arrow key down / s / h / numpad6 - wall

numpad0 / e / u / numpad8 - slow

Tab ( for all at once ) - score
